summary: The owner of a small town bait shop signs up for a fishing tournament in hopes of using the prize money to save his shop from foreclosure.
cast: Bill Engvall|Jim R. Coleman|Mary Rachel Quinn|Wilbur Houston|Richard Riehle|Maureen Preuss|Christopher Schmidt|Rus Blackwell|David Mackey|Billy Ray Cyrus|Vincent Martella|Harve Presnell|Billy Joe Shaver|Tim Powell|David Neil Enfinger|David Preuss|Greg Neff|Tony Lopez|Tom Hillmann|Mikki Scanlon|Jeff Chase|Mark Zona|Keith Alan|Matt Horohoe|Bob 'Smitty' Smith|Preston Clark|Jeremy Prouty|Steve 'Boogie' Brown|Gail Adams|Jon Ellegard|Cody Mack|Jessica Blackmore|Marissa Rocco|Brandon Migliore|Tyler Ross|Chris Adler|Robie Alan|Rabner Amill|Shawn 'Bigwheel' Bidwell|Chris Byrne|Whitney Costner|Eric Ditman|Ricky Dunlop|Jeff Ellenburg|Macaila Fernandes|Jesse Kozel|Tina Kronenberger|Jack Kruse|Jordon Laufer|Kali Littlefield|Douglas Lopez|Mitchell Maggin|Melody Mccraney|Kristin Popelka|Randy Robinson|Jim Romaine|Barbrette Roth|Mark C. title: Baitshop
